name: Chase The UFO
description:
Keyboard controls only. 

W key to Accelerate , A and D keys to turn

Catch the UFO under Time Limit!

Hint: To do a sharp turn let go of accelerator and turn. they are necessary lol 

3 Trees, UFO sprites made by  https://rosie-p.itch.io/ :)

Background Music: 03 - Outride A Crisis - Super Hang-On (Arcade) - Soundtrack - Arcade
